summary: Sphingomonadaceae are common membrane colonizers and biofilm formers . As part of our studies on long-term genetic changes in drinking water biofilm species, we report the draft genome sequence of Sphingmonas strain Sph5 .

Sara Koroli led the sample preparation, experiments, and initial data collection . Kristina Buss was primarily responsible for the subsequent bioinformatics data collection and analysis . Both authors contributed equally to the analysis and interpretation of results .  The draft genome sequence of Sphingomonas paucimobilis was determined through whole genome sequencing and assembly . Sph5 was previously reported to be phylogenetically closest to strains BAB-7166 (99%) and NBRC 13937 (99%), based on 16S rRNA sequencing and cultivation methods .
The Netherlands' water supply water was studied in the Netherlands . The study was published in the journal journal JAMRJL.org .
Characterization of Sphingomonas isolates from Finnish and Swedish drinking water distribution systems. J Appl Microbiol.89:687–696.x.doi: 10.1046/j.1365-2672.x .
Prokka: rapid prokaryotic genome annotation . Prokaka: rapid Prokaryosis genome annotation. Bioinformatics 30:2068–2069.
